title: $300K worth of Magic: The Gathering cards were stolen at this weekend's Gen Con
description: Thieves made off with $300K worth of trading cards whilst vendors were setting up for the event.

title: Baldur's Gate 3 is already one of Steam's biggest games ever
description: The sequel has been breaking its own concurrent record over and over again all weekend.

title: Metal Gear series tops a staggering 60m worldwide sales
description: Hideo Kojima's Metal Gear series has topped over 60 million sales despite the fact there hasn't been a mainline Metal Gear game since 2018.

title: Google Pixel Watch 2 leak reveals the key upgrades we can expect
description: Some specs and details of the Pixel Watch 2 have leaked out, and we should get a faster, longer-lasting smartwatch.

title: Here's exactly how thin the iPhone 15 Pro bezels are likely to look
description: New renders have emerged that illustrate how the smaller bezels on this year's Pro iPhones will shrink own.

title: Don't miss your chance to get a PS5 for less with rare $50 price drop
description: The PS5 has received its deepest discount to date in the US with a full $50 knocked off the sticker price at Best Buy.

title: An unpatchable AMD chip flaw is jailbreaking Tesla cars
description: Security researchers find a way to exploit an AMD vulnerability and get access to paywall-locked Tesla features.
